member:
Welcome {} to Amaze telegram channel.
Please use _/help_ command to get all possible list of operations, or start typing ```/```

You can also use me to get basic info of any GitHub issue / PR. Just include issue / PR number in format #1234)
requestSessionOpen:
Feature request session is _open_.
Please write your feature request here. If you already have a GitHub issue number, mention it here and we'll consider it.
requestSessionClosed:
Feature request session is _closed_.
Please wait for next development cycle to start
default: Sorry didn't get that, please use one of the following commands
commandNotPermitted: Sorry, you're not allowed to perform this operation.
quote_message: Please quote a message for this operation
/contribute:
Thanks for considering to contribute to Amaze. You can contribute through one of the follow ways:

*Translate Amaze*
https://www.transifex.com/amaze/amaze-file-manager/

*Help us with bugfixes/feature requests*
https://github.com/TeamAmaze/AmazeFileManager/issues

*Contribute directly to our source code*
https://github.com/TeamAmaze/AmazeFileManager
/invite:
Use this link to invite your friends here. Thanks (: 
https://t.me/AmazeFileManager
/createissue: Issue created. You can track the progress at ##createissue##
